scripts.start: npm run prepare-python && cd web && npx electron-forge start
scripts.package: npm run prepare-python && cd web && npx electron-forge package
scripts.make: npm run prepare-python && cd web && npm run make
scripts.publish2: ./electron/sync_version.sh && npm run prepare-python && cd web && npx electron-forge publish && poetry publish
scripts.make:all: npm run make:mac && npm run make:mac-arm && npm run make:windows && npm run make:linux
